name: amandio c - iterative - tendrils

wavecode_0_g=0.500
wavecode_0_b=1.000
wavecode_0_a=0.040
wave_0_per_point1=//// stars
wave_0_per_point2=
wave_0_per_point3=q10=123*sample;
wave_0_per_point4=
wave_0_per_point5=x = -.5+sample;
wave_0_per_point6=y = -.5+abs(sin(q10));
wave_0_per_point7=
wave_0_per_point8=t=.004*time;
wave_0_per_point9=mx = x*cos(t)+y*sin(t);
wave_0_per_point10=my = y*cos(t)-x*sin(t);
wave_0_per_point11=
wave_0_per_point12=///random factor
wave_0_per_point13=p1=.1*sin(630*sample);
wave_0_per_point14=p2=.1*sin(530*sample);
wave_0_per_point15=
wave_0_per_point16=x= .5+p1+mx;
wave_0_per_point17=y= .5+p2+my;
wavecode_1_enabled=0
wavecode_1_samples=512
wavecode_1_sep=0
wavecode_1_bSpectrum=1
wavecode_1_bUseDots=1

wavecode_1_smoothing=0.70000
wavecode_1_r=1.000
wavecode_1_g=1.000
wavecode_1_b=1.000
wavecode_1_a=1.000

shapecode_0_border_r=1.000
shapecode_0_border_g=1.000
shapecode_0_border_b=1.000
shapecode_0_border_a=0.000
shape_0_per_frame1=i=2*instance;    
shape_0_per_frame2=
shape_0_per_frame3=sample=instance/1024;    p=q1*3.14*sample+.4*time;
shape_0_per_frame4=
shape_0_per_frame5=x=gmegabuf(i);   y=gmegabuf(i+1);
shape_0_per_frame6=
shape_0_per_frame7=zoom=.2+.03*q1*(1+.5*sin(.1*time));
shape_0_per_frame8=
shape_0_per_frame9=x= .5+.01*zoom*x/q6;      y= .5+.01*zoom*y;
shape_0_per_frame10=
shape_0_per_frame11=rad=rad*zoom*(1+.6*sin(p))/(1+.05*q1); 
shape_0_per_frame12=
shape_0_per_frame13=r2=.5+.3*sin(p);
shape_0_per_frame14=g2=.5-.3*sin(p);
shapecode_1_enabled=0
shapecode_1_sides=4
shapecode_1_additive=0
shapecode_1_thickOutline=0
shapecode_1_textured=0
shapecode_1_num_inst=1024

shapecode_1_y=0.500

shapecode_2_r=0.400
shapecode_2_g=0.500
shapecode_2_b=1.000
shapecode_2_a=0.400

shapecode_3_border_a=0.000
per_frame_init_1=i=0;  
per_frame_init_2=loop(10000, gmegabuf(i)=0;
per_frame_init_3=
per_frame_init_4=i=i+1;);
per_frame_init_5=
per_frame_init_6=t=0;
per_frame_1=wave_a=0;     warp=0;   decay=.1;   
per_frame_2=q6=aspecty;   t=t+.07/fps;   q1=t;
per_frame_3=
per_frame_4=i=0;     x=0;     y=0;     p=0;
per_frame_5=
per_frame_6=loop(1024,       sample=i/1024;
per_frame_7=
per_frame_8=p = .9*p*(1+.1*sin(2*t*sample+t)) +  2*cos(sample+t);
per_frame_9=
per_frame_10=x=x+sin(p);      y=y+cos(p);
per_frame_11=
per_frame_12=gmegabuf(2*i)=x;      gmegabuf(2*i+1)=y;
per_frame_13=
per_frame_14=i=i+1;);
per_frame_15=
per_frame_16=monitor=t;
